comments: She is an enthusiastic professor. She basically gives you 60% free for just attending class and do homework. The rest is yours! People don\'t do good in the class mostly because they don\'t take the class seriously. Remember, DO HOMEWORK!

She knows the material very well but she can\'t teach at all. Her quizzes are easy and straight forward enough if she give you enough time to do them. You need to go to her class about 15 minutes early in order to actually finish the quiz. That sucks for people that have consecutive classes. Talk about fair and equal competition.
Extremely hard to get B or A in class, but it is easy to pass. She\'s helpful on labs, lectures are pretty hard to understand.

Ms. Huang is a very thorough instructor and extremely knowledgeable in the subject matter. Her lectures are very clear and concise. She makes complex subjects understandable and clear. I highly recommend this instructor for all students.
